reviewText:
This is Ken Loach at his very best (Please don't put the name of Winston Churchill under the title as if he was the director!)
The story of what happened in England after the war was and is so very inspiring. The research has found some excellent people to speak in the film. It's a monument and as classic a documentary as you may ever find.
An excellent and very timely film revealing what was won in 1945 and what will be finally lost with the Tory destruction of the NHS.
